me.zingle.api.sdk.services

Class ZingleContactServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.zingle.api.sdk.services.ZingleBaseService<me.zingle.api.sdk.model.ZingleContact>
      • me.zingle.api.sdk.services.ZingleContactServices

  • public class ZingleContactServices
extends ZingleBaseService<me.zingle.api.sdk.model.ZingleContact>
    ZingleBaseService derivation for working with ZingleContact API). Supports all basic functions. Also complemented by ZingleLabel manipulation (attach, detach), ZingleAutomation triggering and setting ZingleContactFieldValues functional.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      • attachLabelAsync

      • attachLabelAsync

        public boolean attachLabelAsync(me.zingle.api.sdk.model.ZingleContact contact,
                       java.lang.String labelId,
                       ServiceDelegate<me.zingle.api.sdk.model.ZingleContact> delegate)
        Same as ZingleContact attachLabel(ZingleContact contact, String labelId), but runs request in separate thread. Result of request is received by proper implementation of ServiceDelegate, provided as function parameter.
        Parameters:
        contact - - ZingleContact to attach label to
        labelId - - ID of attaching label
        delegate - - implementation of ServiceDelegate to get request results
        Returns:
        true if request successfully starts
